page.title: 19SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: Our school is called ST. JOSEPHS R.C.V.A. PRIMARY SCHOOL.It was built in 1891,but it has been added to since then.The sisters of LA RETRAITE own the building and have to keep it in good condition.We have 7 classes now,one for each year.Our headmistress is a nun,as is the deputy. School starts at 8:55 and we do 5 and a half hours work each day.We enjoy playing on the adventure playground,and also enjoy all our sports.We have lots of helpers to cook,clean & supervise us during the day.Some mums come in to hear us read,& sometimes we go out on trips to Taunton Museum,Torquay,Kilve & even to London.We have to wear school uniform,blue in colour.Our P.T.A. helps us to make some extra money to buy equipment we couldn't otherwise afford.Ours is a HAPPY SCHOOL.
